::Aerotaur::
    He looks around him at the battle and spots the two incoming missiles.  
He smirks and flies out of the way.  The two missiles pass by him toward the 
other shooter.  "I love three dimensional combat."  Some of the rapid fire 
shots hit him causing minor damage.  He puts his staff away and opens fire on 
Unitron with four blasts from each arm.  "GET THE HELL AWAY FROM OUR BASE!"
